required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Development of Minidose Inje Cocktail Method for Simultaneous Evaluating Five Cytochrome P450 Isoforms in Human
clinical_study.official_title: Development of High-throughput Minidose Inje Cocktail Method for Simultaneous Evaluating Five Cytochrome P450 Isoforms in Human

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators objectives were developing mini dose five-drug cocktail regimen to evaluate potential drug-drug interactions associated with use of a cocktail of caffeine, losartan, omeprazole, dextromethorphan, and midazolam for simultaneous assessment of CYP1A2, CYP2C9, CYP2C19, CYP2D6, and CYP3A activities.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators objectives were developing minidose five-drug cocktail regimen to evaluate potential drug-drug interactions associated with use of a cocktail of caffeine, losartan, omeprazole, dextromethorphan, and midazolam for simultaneous assessment of CYP1A2, CYP2C9, CYP2C19, CYP2D6, and CYP3A activities.

intervention.description: Thirteen healthy male subjects were given oral doses of 200 μg omeprazole, 2 mg losartan and 2 mg dextromethorphan individually and in combination of five drugs (cocktail) every other days.
intervention.other_name: The drug was made by Yuhan corp.
The drug was exclusively made for this study.

intervention.description: Thirteen healthy male subjects were given oral doses of 200 μg omeprazole, 2 mg losartan and 2 mg dextromethorphan individually and in combination of five drugs (cocktail) every other days.
intervention.other_name: The drug was made by Yuhan corp.
The drug was exclusively made for this study.

intervention.description: Thirteen healthy male subjects were given oral doses of 200 μg omeprazole, 2 mg losartan and 2 mg dextromethorphan individually and in combination of five drugs (cocktail) every other days.
intervention.other_name: The drug was made by Yuhan corp.
The drug was exclusively made for this study.

intervention.description: Group A : Thirteen healthy male subjects were given oral doses of 200 μg omeprazole, 2 mg losartan and 2 mg dextromethorphan individually and in combination of five drugs (cocktail) every other days. Group B : Thirteen healthy male subjects received 100 μg midazolam and 2 mg caffeine individually followed by five-drugs cocktail every two days.
intervention.other_name: All of the drugs were made by Yuhan corp.
All of the drugs were exclusively made for this study.

intervention.description: Thirteen healthy male subjects received 100 μg midazolam and 2 mg caffeine individually followed by five-drugs cocktail every two days.
intervention.other_name: The drug was made by Yuhan corp.
The drug was exclusively made for this study.

intervention.description: Thirteen healthy male subjects received 100 μg midazolam and 2 mg caffeine individually followed by five-drugs cocktail every two days.
intervention.other_name: The drug was made by Yuhan corp.
The drug was exclusively made for this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male subject whose CYP2C9, CYP2C19, CYP2D6 genotype was determined
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject who has abnormal laboratory test results

responsible_party.investigator_title: Department of Pharmacology and Pharmacogenomics Research Center
